starters.name: Garlic Bread
starters.description: Crispy, buttered bread with garlic and herbs.

starters.name: Bruschetta
starters.description: Tomato, basil, and balsamic vinegar on toasted bread.

starters.name: Caprese Salad
starters.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomato, basil, and balsamic glaze.

starters.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
starters.description: Mushrooms filled with garlic, cheese, and breadcrumbs.

starters.name: Samosa
starters.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas.

starters.name: Paneer Tikka
starters.description: Grilled cubes of paneer marinated in yogurt and spices.

mains.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
mains.description: Classic Italian pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, and parmesan.

mains.name: Lasagna
mains.description: Layers of pasta, meat sauce, béchamel, and mozzarella cheese.

mains.name: Chicken Parmesan
mains.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella.

mains.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
mains.description: Rich and creamy sauce over tender fettuccine pasta.

mains.name: Butter Chicken
mains.description: Tender chicken cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based gravy.

mains.name: Paneer Butter Masala
mains.description: Paneer cubes in a smooth, creamy tomato gravy.

mains.name: Biryani
mains.description: Fragrant rice cooked with spices and choice of chicken or mutton.

mains.name: Dal Tadka
mains.description: Lentils cooked with ghee, garlic, and spices, served with rice.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Layers of coffee-soaked cake with mascarpone cream.

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

desserts.name: Panna Cotta
desserts.description: Creamy vanilla pudding with a berry compote.

desserts.name: Chocolate Mousse
desserts.description: Decadent chocolate mousse topped with whipped cream.

desserts.name: Gulab Jamun
desserts.description: Deep-fried milk dough balls soaked in sugary syrup.

desserts.name: Ras Malai
